        public Menu()

      • Menu

        public Menu(java.lang.String title,
            java.lang.String items,
            int size,
            greenfoot.Color mfg,
            greenfoot.Color mbg,
            greenfoot.Color sfg,
            greenfoot.Color sbg,
            MenuCommands commands)
        A constructor for objects of class Menu
        Parameters:
        title - is the text displayed in the main section of the menu
        items - is the text that is displayed in the submenu section of the menu
        size - is the text size that will be used to display the text from the menu
        mfg - is the main foreground color (or the text color for the main section) of the menu
        mbg - is the main background color (or the background color for the main section) of the menu
        sfg - is the submenu foreground color (or the text color for the submenu section) of the menu
        sbg - is the submenu background color (or the background color for the submenu section) of the menu
        commands - stores an object that deals with the functionality of the menu

    • Method Detail

      • act

        public void act()
        Act - do whatever the Menu wants to do. This method is called whenever the 'Act' or 'Run' button gets pressed in the environment.
